canFreeze(address).details: Checks if the oracle can freeze/unfreeze a market

params.market: The address of the market to check

returns._0: bool True if the oracle can freeze/unfreeze this market

canResolve(address).details: Checks if the oracle can resolve a specific market

params.market: The address of the market to check

returns._0: bool True if the oracle can resolve this market

freezeMarket(address).details: Freezes a market to prevent trading

params.market: The address of the market to freeze

getResolution(address).details: Gets the resolution status and result for a market

params.market: The address of the market to check

returns.resolved: True if the market has been resolved
returns.result: The resolution result (only valid if resolved is true)

resolveMarket(address,bool).details: Resolves a market with the given result

params.market: The address of the market to resolve
params.result: The resolution result (true for YES wins, false for NO wins)

unfreezeMarket(address).details: Unfreezes a market to allow trading

params.market: The address of the market to unfreeze
